name: wp9768627_1759762694.jpg
description: So this is what i was able to do. Description accepts html, so this link is the link to login. Username is "maury" and password is "123" for now. The images are saved in a github repo (for this example, its here). You will also need a github token, with just "repo" scope - im using mine atm. To have this site on your domain, you will need to fork the repo with this code (its private for now, i'll make it public in a few minutes since my github token was there initially, i have to delete commit history). Then deploy a vercel app and point it to your domain. You can google it, or I'll help you out with that. So, there will be two github repos in total: one for your site's code, another where your images will be stored. Both can be private/public or any combination as such. Thats it ig?

name: 75379_1759762927.gif
description: The images are saved in a github repo (for this example, its here). You will also need a github token, with just "repo" scope - im using mine atm. Tokens can be made on github. Do no share it with anyone. It will set as an environment variable on vercel.
